data.text:
GIMP Updater: Review

GIMP Updater by GIMP is a software application designed to keep GIMP, the popular open-source image manipulation program, up to date with the latest features and security patches. Here is a review of the GIMP Updater:

Features

Automatically checks for new updates for GIMP

Downloads and installs updates seamlessly

Ensures GIMP is always running the latest version

Improves security by keeping software up to date

Benefits

Convenient way to stay current with GIMP enhancements

Enhanced performance and stability with each update

Simple and user-friendly interface for effortless updating

Receive notifications when new updates are available

Overall Impression

GIMP Updater by GIMP is a valuable tool for users who rely on GIMP for their image editing needs. By ensuring that the software is always up to date, users can enjoy improved performance, new features, and enhanced security. The automatic update process simplifies staying current with GIMP's developments, making it a must-have for GIMP users.

Overview

GIMP Updater is a Shareware software in the category Miscellaneous developed by GIMP.

It was checked for updates 251 times by the users of our client application UpdateStar during the last month.

The latest version of GIMP Updater is 2.8.19, released on 05/20/2019. It was initially added to our database on 11/06/2016. The most prevalent version is 2.8.19, which is used by 100 % of all installations.

GIMP Updater runs on the following operating systems: Windows. The download file has a size of 344465504MB.

GIMP Updater has not been rated by our users yet.

Pros

Automatically checks for updates for the GIMP software

Helps users stay up to date with the latest features and security patches

Simplifies the update process for GIMP users

Cons

Limited functionality compared to full GIMP software

Possibility of encountering bugs or errors during the update process

Requires an internet connection to check for and download updates

Elena Angelini
